mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT R.REPORT_NO ,R.MEMBER_NO ,R.IMAGE_NO ,R.TITLE ,R.CONTENT ,R.ENROLL_DATE ,R.MODIFY_DATE ,R.DEL_YN ,I.IMAGE_PATH ,M.NICK AS WRITER_NICK FROM REPORT_BULLETIN_BOARD R JOIN IMAGE I ON I.IMAGE_NO = R.IMAGE_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE R.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC ) T ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM REPORT_BULLETIN_BOARD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT P.REPORT_NO ,P.MEMBER_NO ,P.IMAGE_NO ,P.TITLE ,P.CONTENT ,P.ENROLL_DATE ,P.MODIFY_DATE ,P.DEL_YN ,I.IMAGE_PATH ,M.NICK AS WRITER_NICK FROM REPORT_BULLETIN_BOARD P JOIN IMAGE I ON I.IMAGE_NO = P.IMAGE_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND P.REPORT_NO = #{reportNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE REPORT_BULLETIN_BOARD SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE REPORT_NO = #{reportNo}
